verses.verse: Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H5782>roused<s%> me as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H5782>awakened<s%> from his <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%>?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> with its <S%H1543>bowl<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it, and its <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> on it with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4166>spouts<s%> belonging to each of the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it;

also <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>trees<s%> by it, <S%H259>one<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H1543>bowl<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on its <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>side.<s%> "
Then I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> are <S%H428>these,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%>?"

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do you not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Not by <S%H2428>might<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> by <S%H3581>power,<s%> but by My <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H4310>'What<s%> are you, O <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>? <S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> [you will become] a <S%H4334>plain;<s%> and he will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7222>top<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> with <S%H8663>shouts<s%> of <S%H2580>"Grace,<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> to it!"' "
Also the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have <S%H3245>laid<s%> the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> will <S%H1214>finish<s%> [it.] Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.

"For <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H936>despised<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H6996>things<s%>? But <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H913>plumb<s%> <S%H68><s%> <S%H68>line<s%> <S%H913><s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> â€“ [these are] the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1992>which<s%> <S%H7751>range<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Then I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>trees<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and on its <S%H8040>left<s%>?"

And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H7641>branches<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>pipes,<s%> which <S%H9553>empty<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> [oil] from themselves?"
So he <S%H559>answered<s%> me <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do you not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>anointed<s%> <S%H3323><s%> <S%H1121>ones,<s%> who are <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
